data.message:
I've been having problems in my group since last night with the pictures being bumped to the top of the group page when people comment on them. Normally when someone comments on a picture in an album, it bumps to the top of my group page. Since last night this is not happening - this is a huge issue, because I am going to have to go through every picture in every album to see if anyone has made comments. Can you please take a look at this and please tell me it is a temporary glitch and you can fix it!!
Wall pictures are bumping, if I comment on an album the entire album bumps, but individual pictures in the albums do not bump at all.

replies.message: PLEASE FIX THIS PROBLEM,  ITS HUGE
Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Deborah. You can help us track this issue by reporting it to us through our Help Center here: http://on.fb.me/1Qnw6CG. Thanks! -Anna
J'ai le même soucis avec les photos de mon groupe depuis hier. Le lien ci-dessus ne fonctionne pas pour signaler le problème. C'est très ennuyeux, pouvez-vous régler le problème au plus vite svp?
Yeah thanks for replying to their problem with their page, but IGNORING ours!!!   Thanks. So much.
